findings.title: Security group allows 0.0.0.0/0 on port 22
findings.description: Security group sg-0abc123 allows SSH access from any IP address, violating network segmentation requirements.
findings.remediation: Restrict SSH access to specific IP ranges or use Session Manager

findings.title: Security group allows broad egress
findings.description: Security group sg-0def456 allows all outbound traffic. Consider restricting to required destinations.
findings.remediation: Implement egress filtering to known-good destinations

findings.title: IAM user without MFA - admin-user
findings.description: User 'admin-user' has console access but no MFA device configured. This user has AdministratorAccess policy.
findings.remediation: Enable MFA for this user immediately

findings.title: IAM user without MFA - dev-user
findings.description: User 'dev-user' has console access but no MFA device configured.

findings.title: IAM user without MFA - readonly-user
findings.description: User 'readonly-user' has console access but no MFA device configured.

findings.title: Unpatched CVE on EC2 instance
findings.description: CVE-2024-1234 affects OpenSSL version installed on instance. CVSS score 9.8.
findings.remediation: Update OpenSSL to version 3.0.12 or later

findings.title: Outdated TLS version detected
findings.description: TLS 1.0 is enabled on load balancer. PCI DSS 4.0 requires TLS 1.2 or higher.
findings.remediation: Update ALB security policy to ELBSecurityPolicy-TLS13-1-2-2021-06

findings.title: S3 bucket was publicly accessible
findings.description: Bucket 'prod-data-bucket' had public read access enabled. Remediated on 2024-12-04.
findings.remediation: Removed public access and enabled S3 Block Public Access

findings.title: CloudTrail not enabled in eu-west-1
findings.description: CloudTrail logging was not configured in eu-west-1 region. Remediated on 2024-12-08.
findings.remediation: Enabled multi-region CloudTrail with S3 logging
